result.content:
end can not play is still unknown.If Atletico can finally win, then they must hope that their opponent is Bayern. 1974, Bayern clinch the victory over Atletico a Champions League club history. So this time, why can not Atletico revenge, and create their own world it 1974 Atletico Madrid reached the Champions League final, Argentine zapatillas nike air presto camo coach Lorenzo, participated in the 1966 World Cup in England's 1-0 victory over Argentina game, when he was England coach Ramsey complained include Lorenzo Argentine football players, including dirty.1998 World Cup, the same as the war Britain and Argentina after an Argentine player David Beckham was hit, the other with a leg hook retaliatory, which exaggerated the ground, Beckham was sent off. Britain and Argentina fought a two-party bickering month, while the Argentine team that raises the event is now Atletico Madrid coach Diego Simeone.Since 2011 stepped in to become Atletico Madrid coach Diego Simeone had this transformation was almost hopeless team full of hope and vitality, then they clinch the European Cup and Super Cup, and the Super Bowl opponent happens to be Chelsea.The next two years, a step Atletico enrich strength, Atletico's performance this season can be described as a towering fly. Currently, the sheets firmly occupy Legion League championship, as long as they win the next next Levante and Malaga for the last two league, they will be ahead of a champion, Barcelona will have the final round Camp Nou lined up to welcome the new Primera Liga champions."I tried to live like every day as the last day of life, my passion and my players to communicate my thoughts, football is my life." Simonyi said in an interview with 442 magazine, "I always thought, if I do not focus on the game, they'll probably put me fired tomorrow, so I have to win every game, and this is my way of life. "Atletico had a referee who is a bird of bad news t "friend"Perhaps for

Atletico, the only bad news from the referee. UEFA announced the candidate is Italian referee Rizzoli. Rizzoli was born in 1971, has been selected as one of Brazil's World Cup referee enforcement. In the 2009-2010 season, Rizzoli had law enforcement had the European Cup final, when Atletico won 1-0 victory over Fulham. He also referees in the Champions League final last season.Rizzoli helped Inter Milan coach Jose Mourinho won the league championship. That was in the 2008-2009 season, at home against Inter championship in Rome, Rome was achieved 3:1 lead, but soon gave Rizzoli countryMeters a penalty, slow nike roshe run espa√±a motion within a restricted area that was Balotelli diving. Inter through unwarranted penalty to pull the score 2:3, 3:3 final harvest valuable point, when the season Inter Milan eventually won the league championship. That game, Rizzoli's poor performance so that he was once decentralized enforcement Serie B. It is worth mentioning that, after the end of that game, when he was Inter coach Jose Mourinho said publicly that "Rizzoli is my friend."This season, Rizzoli is to let the Italian football world saw a joke. In a game, Rizzoli hesitated because of a penalty fine or not a full five minutes. Not only repeated communication with the linesman and referee gate line, even if the parties ask the judge Penalties: "Tell me the truth, tell the truth " to this part when the referee is somewhat awkward. Italian media even said after the game, I hope Rizzoli Do not lose face in the World Cup.Beijing on April 29 morning, the Primera Liga club Barcelona confirmed to the Commission, the club Neymar transfer operation does not exist violations, Barca do not bear any punishment. Two months ago, the Financial Monitorin

g Committee of the Commission under the La Liga club go from Neymar signing of all relevant material, after investigation and analysis system, the Financial Monitoring Committee passed a resolution Barcelona found guilty, the news of the recent worries foreign aggression Barcelona finally won breathing space.Beijing tomorrow morning, Chelsea Champions League semi-final second leg will face rivals Atletico Madrid at home to Stamford Bridge. Is likely to once again face the Blues put the "bus" array, Atletico could find a breakthrough it Blues Cech or Terry are good on the busThe first leg, the Spanish media ridiculed Mourinho England's double-decker bus drove to the home of Atletico Madrid, Atletico's attack nike free run 2 comprar eventually failed.Ugly face each other four defenders, three quarter of the metal matrix, Atletico forced into Barcelona, Possession 68% rate has created the most this season's. But Simone did her surgical solution, but has not been able to bypass the blue "bus" and eventually shake hands.Seeing "bus tactics" received miraculous, the last round of the Premier League, Mourinho won the highest voice Liverpool face, and with a mixed lineup old tricks. The campaign Liverpool controlled the ball 73 percent, twice the number of shots the Blues, but with 2-0 defeat.Mourinho's tactical philosophy has always been a practical first, battles Atletico, no one doubts that he would cast a third consecutive "bus tactics." And before training yesterday, when the road against Atletico Madrid goalkeeper Petr Cech injured captain John Terry plus Azar, Samuel Eto'o all participated in the training, which greatly Chelsea fans happy. You know, Mike Mussina had revealed Cech had dislocated because of the surgery, the season has been reimbursed
